messages.title: Nick Perry - THE STRONG VOICE FOR US
Fighting for real change for Hastings & Rye
OUR COUNTRY NEEDS A STRONG OPPOSITION

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Hastings & Rye. Across the whole constituency schools are having their budgets cut.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes a need for a strong opposition and presents Nick Perry as a strong voice for the constituents, specifically against Hard Brexit, for NHS funding, and opposing school budget cuts.
